SELECT inter.id,inter.system_code as systemCode, sys.system_name as systemName ,inter.API_code as apiCode, inter.API_name as apiName, inter.version, inter.api_doc_uri as apiDocUrl, inter.create_datetime FROM interfaceinfo inter, system_info sys WHERE inter.system_code=#{systemCode} AND inter.system_code = sys.system_code
and (inter.API_code like concat('%',#{queryStr},'%') or inter.API_name like concat('%',#{queryStr},'%') )
select count(*) from interfaceinfo where system_code=#{systemCode} limit 1
